sentences.sContent: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia.
sentences.sContent_eng: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia.
sentences.sCn: 如果我按肺炎给病人治疗，他一定会死于肺炎的。

sentences.sContent: Many of us live our lives running behind time, but we only reach it when we die of a heart attack or in a car accident rushing to be on time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many of us live our lives running behind time, but we only reach it when we die of a heart attack or in a car accident rushing to be on time.
sentences.sCn: 大多数人为了生存拼命的赶时间，但是我们恐怕只能等死于心脏病或者在赶时间的时候葬身车祸才能赶上时间吧。

sentences.sContent: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia only.
sentences.sContent_eng: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia only.
sentences.sCn: 如果我给肺炎病人治病，他只会死于肺炎。
